examples.name: image-basic
image-circular
examples.content:
export const ImageCircular = () => (
  <Image
    src="https://bit.ly/naruto-sage"
    boxSize="150px"
    borderRadius="full"
    fit="cover"
    alt="Naruto Uzumaki"
  />
)

examples.name: image-with-aspect-ratio
image-with-fit
examples.content:
export const ImageWithFit = () => (
  <Image
    border="1px solid red"
    rounded="md"
    h="200px"
    w="300px"
    fit="contain"
    src="https://bit.ly/dan-abramov"
  />
)
